rukus.text: Did the story of the noble guests of Abraham reach you
When they entered upon him and they said: peace (and well-being). He said: peace (and well-being) strangers
Then he went to his family and brought a fat (roasted) calf
Then he placed it close to them saying: do you not eat
Then he felt afraid of them, they said: do not be afraid. And they gave him good news of a knowledgeable son
Then his wife came forward screaming, striking her face, and she said: I am an infertile old woman
They said: that is what your Master said, indeed He is the wise, the knowledgeable
He said: you messengers, so what is your business
They said: we were sent to a group of guilty ones
so that we send upon them stones of clay
marked by your Master for the excessive ones
So We brought out anyone who was among the believers in it
But We only found a house of the submitted ones in it
And We left a sign in it for those who fear the painful punishment
And in (the story of) Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authorization
Then he turned away with his base (of supporters) and said: a magician or a madman
So We took him and his troops, then We threw them in the sea, and he was to blame
And in (the story of) Aad when We sent upon them the destructive wind
It did not leave anything that it came upon it, except making it as the decomposed thing
And (the story of) Thamud when they were told: enjoy yourselves for a while
Then they rebelled against their Masterâ€™s command, so the thunderbolt took them while they were looking
Then they could not stand up and they could not take revenge (or defend)
And people of Noah in the past, indeed they were disobedient people
